label: Employee Benefits Policy Communication
quote: 4.5.16 Interpret and prepare informative material for employees on new, changed, and pending policy, and outlines impact on existing benefit program entitlements.

label: Complex Retirement Case Assistance
quote: 4.5.17 Assist with difficult and complex cases such as disability retirements involving sensitive and controversial problems.

label: Employee Counseling for Benefit Decisions
quote: 4.5.18 Assist with counseling employees to ensure that all pertinent information has been received before employee benefit-related decisions is rendered.

label: Military Deposit Process Explanation
quote: 4.5.19 Assist with explaining the process to employees wanting information regarding making post-56 military deposit and how they may receive additional service credit towards retirement.

label: Retirement Correspondence and Congressional Inquiry Response
quote: 4.5.20 Assist with preparing sensitive correspondence on complex retirement and benefits matters and prepare responses to congressional inquiries.
